### New Functions (dojo-functions.js)

```javascript
/**
 * Check and unlock achievements
 */
async function checkAchievements() {
  const achievements = config.achievements.badges;
  const unlocked = [];
  
  for (const badge of achievements) {
    if (meetsCondition(badge.condition) && !hasBadge(badge.id)) {
      unlockBadge(badge);
      unlocked.push(badge);
    }
  }
  
  if (unlocked.length > 0) {
    celebrationAchievements(unlocked);
  }
  
  return unlocked;
}

/**
 * Unlock a badge
 */

}
```
